column4: Should I use ext3 or ext4? Can I upgrade from the former to the latter without erasing data?
So I should try to use ext4 if possible, for my primary partition...
I'm going to see if using ext3 fixes the install problem I've been getting.
there was a bug in the kernel affecting ext4. it was supposed to be fixed before the 9.04 release but i'm not sure if it was
